title: Blended Learning Readiness and Digital Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and secondary education curriculum management
context.additional_context: Middle school social studies teachers develop blended learning design competencies through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core elements for designing blended learning environments
Learners can produce three or more subject-integrated materials using digital content creation tools.
Learners can design blended lesson plans applying self-regulated learning theory.
Learners can assess their technical proficiency levels using a digital competency diagnostic tool.
Learners can predict at least three technical issues that may arise during blended learning implementation and propose alternatives.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)
Digital Content Creation Tools (Canva, Google Workspace)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
